Translations.Text: A ppafev icenga iqeueanen mavi, n wid iumnen, d udayen akked wid ipcaraken. A ppafev wid iqeoben mavi, s lmaenana, ar wid iumnen, d wid innan: "nekwni d imasieiyen". Ayagi, acku llan degsen ixelwiyen, ioehbaniyen, u nitni ur sme$woen ara iman nnsen
Ma slan i wayen id iusan ar Umazan, a pwaliv allen nnsen ccuoent d imeiii, seg wayen ufan n tidep. Qqaoen: "a Mass nne$! Numen, Aru ya$ seg inagan
Acu i $ iu$en ur numin s Oebbi akked wayen i $ d iusan n tidep; ur nessarem a $ Issekcem, Mass nne$, s agdud iaaoviyen
A ten Ioazi Oebbi, $ef wayen d qqaoen, s leonanat, ddawat sen isaffen ppazzalen, degsen ad wekkoen. Wagi d aoazi n lauuam
Wid ijehlen, u skaddben issekniyen nne£, widak, d at Loahennama
A wid iumnen! Ur pgeddilet ayen imaanen i wen Ieell Oebbi. Ur zegret tilas. Oebbi, s tidep, ur Ieemmel ara wid izegren tilas
Eccet seg wayen ikwen Ioeeq Oebbi, ieellen, imaanen. Eezzbet i Oebbi. YiS, kunwi, ay tumnem

Ur kwen Ipqassa Oebbi $ef tgallit n tkerkas. Maca, a kwen Iqiss $ef tgallit n uuee. Takweffaot is: a ppecceccem mraw ime$ban, akken tecceccam tawacult nnwen, ne$ a ten tesselsem, ne$ a psereem i wakli. Win ur nwaa ara, ad iueum krav wussan. D tagi ay d takweffaot n tgallit nnwen, ma teggullem. Eiifet di tgallit nnwen. Akka i wen d Ipbeggin Oebbi issekniyen, amar a ppesnemmrem
A wid iumnen! Ccoab, leqwmeo, tiaancuoin, taseqqaot, d ayen kan icemten, seg igi n Cciian. Ihi, veooeft asen, amar a prebeem
Ib$a kan Cciian ad isker ticenga akked dd$el garawen, s ccoab akked leqwmeo, a kwen iveooef seg usmekti n Oebbi, akked teallit. Day ur tepfukkum ara
A$et awal i Oebbi, a$et awal i Umazan. £uowat! Ma twexxoem, cfut ar Amazan, iwata yas kan anabi ipbegginen
Ur telli tiyta deg wid iumnen, u xeddmen ayen ilhan, $ef wayen ccan, ma eezzben, umnen, xedmen ayen ilhan, sinna eezzben, umnen, sinna, eezzben u maanen. Oebbi Ieemmel lauuam

A wid iumnen! War ccekk, a kwen Iweddeb Oebbi $ef wayen tepueggidem s ifassen nnwen, u s ixtucen nnwen, iwakken ad Ieeo Oebbi anwa i T ippagwaden, di tbavnit. Win izegren tilas, deffir waya, fellas aaaqeb aqeoean

A wid iumnen! Ur pueggidet di zzyaoa nnwen. Win iueggden segwen, u iaammed, aqeiii: ad iseddeq, si lmal is, ayen in$a s uuyada s, a d eudden, f waya, sin irgazen ieesbiyen segwen. D tikci ara iawven ar Lkaaba. Ne$ takweffaot: ad iccecc ime$ban, ne$, ayen iswan aya, ad iueum. Ad ijeooeb vveoo n lameo is. Oebbi Isemmee i wayen iaaddan. Win iu$alen a d Irr Oebbi segs ppao. Oebbi d Uzmir, Ippara d ppao
Teell awen uuyada n yill akked ucci s. D lqut i kunwi akw iminigen. Tepwagdel awen uuyada di tmurt, skud aql akwen d zziyyao. Eezzbet i Oebbi, $uoeS ara tepwafesrem
